sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Col, Container, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; import logo from "../../assets/logo/logo.png"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Footer = () => { const [scroll, setScroll] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { if (window.scrollY > 200) { setScroll(true); } else { setScroll(false); } }; document.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); }, []); const handleOnTop = () => { window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: "smooth" }); }; return (
